function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Stigmatism and distrust in health services resulting in efforts to hide cases of contagious diseases (e.g. Ebola, SARS, influenza, tuberculosis).","Impact":"Exacerbated spread of contagious diseases, decreased chance of survival for infected individuals, increased risk of infecting family members and wider community.","Mitigation":"Public health education and awareness programs, transparency in healthcare systems, community engagement and trust-building initiatives.","Technologies":"Health tracking and monitoring technologies, telemedicine, public health communication platforms.","People":"Individuals infected with contagious diseases, family members, carers, wider community.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, community leaders."}]}
